subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: What Will Religion Look Like in 2100?
description: A quick win: understand What Will Religion Look Like in 2100?.

hook.text: Imagine religion in 2100. Fewer institutions, more personal practice. AI spiritual guides. Faith remixed for a new era.

buildup.text: Trends suggest more hybrid spirituality, less denomination loyalty, and communities built online, not in buildings.

discovery.text: Religion will personalize. Like playlists, people will mix Buddhist meditation, Christian ethics, and Sufi poetry.

twist.text: But the core human needs won't change. Birth, death, meaning, and belonging will still demand rituals and stories.

climax.text: Religion won't disappear. It will transform. The packaging changes; the hunger for meaning and transcendence never will.

punchline.text: Religion transforms but never dies. The hunger for meaning is permanent.

quiz.question: How might religion change by 2100?
options: It will become more personalized and hybrid while core human needs for meaning persist
